name: Data Destruction
hours: Monday: 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM Tuesday: 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM Wednesday: 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM Thursday: 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM Friday: 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM
materials: Cell Phones; Computer Monitors; Computer (Recycling); Electronics; Hard Drives; Video Game Systems; Printers/Scanners/Fax Machines; Memory (RAM), Flash Card/Drive; MP3 Players; Cameras; Laptop Computers; Computer Peripherals; Small Electronics; Small Televisions; Televisions; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes: We specialize in hard drive and digital media wiping, shredding and recycling.  There is a $10 fee for this service if you drop it off and it is already removed from the computer.  We guarantee that all data will be destroyed before recycling.   We also accept most electronics for recycling at no charge although there is a small fee of $20 each for CRT monitors and small TV's.  These items can be dropped off at our office during regular business hours.  Our mobile Data Destruction Truck can be scheduled to come to your location for on site hard drive shredding.  A certificate of destruction will be issued for all hard drive shredding or wiping.
